entry.title: For the Moon Goddess
entry.summary:
Author: ProLuna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,552Chapters: 33/42Kudos: 106

Summary: Stiles is a new novice at the Beacon Hills Temple of the Moon Goddess, where the priests have forsworn all women and have ritual sex to make seminal offerings to their deity. In an AU where a moon cult is the dominant religion in an alternate fantasy-type world, Stiles navigates friendship, love, and a confusing priesthood that has way too many rules about sex for basically being Sex University.A lot of other pairings along the way, but from the beginning, this story is about how we get to Sterek.

entry.title: Dare Me Tonight
entry.summary:
Author: esmeraldaesme99

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,712Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: They start the game to “keep the holiday spirit going.” First rounds are silly—truths about embarrassing stories, light dares. Half-drunk and cocky, Jackson dares Stiles to “give Derek a little holiday flash—just your tits, babe, show him what he’s missing.” Stiles hesitates but Jackson eggs her on: “Come on, you’re my slutty girl, right?” --- From a humiliating truth-or-dare, Innocent beauty Stiles, trapped in a toxic relationship with bragging boyfriend Jackson, secretly succumbs to the possessive lust of his best friend Derek—cheating in stolen nights of raw, toy-filled hotel sessions and risky fucks until Derek violently claims her forever, breeding her multiple times in front of her broken ex.

entry.title: lightning
entry.summary:
Author: sparassiss

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,458Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: Bolts of lightning shoot through Derek’s abdomen. He curls in on himself pitifully, wrapping his shaking arms around himself while he tucks his legs close to his chest. A pained noise escapes his mouth and he winces at himself, embarrassed to voice his distress even to the empty bedroom. “Derek?” Um. Not so empty after all. Was he so stuck in his head, in his spasming body, that he failed to hear his anchor approaching from the other room? “Der, is it happening again?” Stiles’ sympathetic voice comes from right behind him now, and soon warm, sturdy arms wrap around his torso from behind. He feels small all of a sudden, still hunched over himself horizontally on the bed, and Stiles’ familiar sweet cinnamon scent hardly breaks through his haze of pain. His husband’s voice is soft, comforting, compassionate, yet Derek doesn’t want compassion right now. Doesn’t want to be in this body, with this stupid human pain.

entry.title: wake up to remembering
entry.summary:
Author: sparassiss

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,115Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: It’s three in the morning. Five years after the Nogitsune. Two sets of breaths in the loft. Stiles counts. He has ten fingers, five on each hand. His heart is beating out of his chest, fast, yet present. He is alive. He can’t sleep, but he’s alive. That’s a lie. He slept for three hours then woke up in a cold sweat, his chest tight and his own rapid heartbeat in his ears. He won’t even try to go back to sleep; knows the drill by now, this too-familiar panicked sensation that means he’s out of control of his own body, yet perfectly safe at the same time. “Stiles?” Derek’s voice is like a warm blanket wrapping around him. Stiles looks down at his boyfriend, who gazes up at him sleepily in return, tugging him impossibly closer by the arm he already has wrapped around his waist. They can’t bear to part with each other, even in sleep.

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,880Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 114

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once, from a woman who wore it like skin. Now hemlock blooms in his own hands, and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,188,708Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 56

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces—human and otherwise—are already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn’t. Protection becomes complicated. And the past—buried, sealed, and forgotten—refuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 1,067

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.
